inclusion.criterion: Acute cholecystitis not improving on medical treatment for 48 hours
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Biliary colic, mucocele of gall bladder and pyocele of gall bladder
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologist's (ASA) score: grade I, II, III
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Documented neurological, renal and Liver disease
exclusion.label: unknown
